title: Skrewdriver Live - The Battle of Waterloo - 25th Anniversary Edi
description:
http://www.bloodandhonourworldwide.co.uk/history/waterloo.html

Skrewdriver Live - The Battle of Waterloo - 12th September 1992

25th Anniversary Edition

This is a fan edit of Skrewdrivers finest LIVE release.

What I never liked about the original releases of this album were the placement of the intros and rants by Ian in between the tracks.

For example: Track 1 Back with a Bang, ends with Ian introducing the next song, Tomorrow Belongs to Me, Track 2. 

On the original cut of this album Track 2 starts AFTER Ian's intro, it always seemed out of place to me and distracting when listening to the album.

This has now been corrected.

I purchased this CD from a legit, well as much as a legit source can be found online. 

I ripped the entire album into a single WAV track then made the edit using Audacity straight into MP3 format @ 320.

I then added the id3 tags via Media Monkey.

I hope you all enjoy


Hail !
